In the sleazoid tradition of such S & M exploitation classics as S.S. Nazi Love Camp and Salon Kitty comes Red Nights of the Gestapo (aka Reich Conspiration). Return to the depths of WWII Nazi depravity, as Hitler&#039;s Secret Service pulls in 12 gorgeous women to entertain the Deutschland upper crust with kinky sex acts, over the course of a single weekend. The organizers, however, fail to let the girls in on a little secret: they are being used as pawns in a nefarious plot to rub out key military and political officials. A mad orgiastic feast of sex, violence, and torture follows.


Released by Exploitation Digital
Running Time: 103 minutes
Audio/Subtitles: 2.0 Dolby Digital Italian with English subs
Format: NTSC
Aspect Ratio: Anamorphic Widescreen 1.85:1
